Rulings.Base:
1. Sending a Fairy-Type monster from your hand to the GY is a cost.
2. The effect of "Herald of Perfection" does not target.
3. If "Herald of Perfection" is no longer face-up on the field when its effect resolves, the effect is still applied.
4. You cannot use "Herald of Perfection" to negate the effect of an already face-up Continuous Spell or Trap Card.
